dishes.name: Roasted Vegetables
dishes.description: Beets, Sweet Potatoes, Potatoes, Carrots, Parsnips

dishes.name: Pearl Couscous Salad
dishes.description: Juicy tomatoes, crisp cucumbers, kalamata olives, and fresh basil for herbal brightness pair perfectly in this light, refreshing side dish.

dishes.name: Vegan Sauteed Mushrooms
dishes.description: Fact — a caramelized mushroom is a tasty mushroom. This is the easiest side dish in the world and all you need are some mushrooms and a little bit of time.

dishes.name: Fried chicken
dishes.description: Jammy lemons and plump roasted dates are cooked with this chicken for a sweet and easy alternative to a whole roast bird.

dishes.name: Hot-smoked salmon vol-au-vents
dishes.description: A brilliant main for a special occasion – make these hot-smoked salmon vol au vents ahead of time, then reheat and assemble to serve.

dishes.name: Roast pork shoulder with cinnamon and clementines
dishes.description: Serve this fall-apart roast pork shoulder with tortillas, sour cream and lime and let everyone dig in.

dishes.name: Ice Cream
dishes.description: Ice cream is a mixture of milk, cream, sugar, and sometimes other ingredients that has been frozen into a soft, creamy delight using special techniques. Ice cream has been a popular treat for hundreds of years but has only become commonplace since the widespread use of refrigeration. The exploding popularity of ice cream has led to a number of ice cream variations including frozen custard, frozen yogurt, and even non-dairy versions made with ingredients like coconut milk.
